contentrichtext.text: '''Xiong County''' ({{zh|s=雄县|t=雄縣|p=Xióng Xiàn}}) is a county under the jurisdiction of [[Baoding]] [[prefecture-level city]], [[Hebei]], China.<ref name = "Admin Div">[http://www.xzqh.org/html/list/42.html 保定市-行政区划网] </ref> ==Administrative Divisions<ref name = "Admin Div"/>== Towns: *[[Xiongzhou]] (雄州镇), [[Zangang]] (昝岗镇), [[Daying, Xiong County|Daying]] (大营镇) Townships: *[[Longwan Township]] (龙湾乡), [[Zhugezhuang Township]] (朱各庄乡), [[Mijiawu Township]] (米家务乡), [[Shuangtang Township]] (双堂乡), [[Zhanggang Township]] (张岗乡), [[Beishakou Township]] (北沙口乡) ==External links== {{reflist}} {{Baoding-geo-stub}} {{coord|38|59|N|116|06|E|region:CN-13_type:adm2nd_source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Baoding]] [[Category:County-level divisions of Hebei]] {{County-level divisions of Hebei}}
